name: google-add
description: When there is a trigger on a specified schedule, do action

extended_input_schema.name: trigger_every
extended_input_schema.label: Trigger every
extended_input_schema.hint:
Define repeating schedule. Enter whole numbers only.
                        This field can be set to a minimum of 5 minutes.

extended_input_schema.name: start_after
extended_input_schema.label: Start after
extended_input_schema.hint: Set date and time to start or leave blank to start immediately. Once recipe has been run or tested, value cannot be changed.

block.name: create_object
block.description: Create User list in Google Ads

extended_input_schema.name: client_customer_id
extended_input_schema.label: Client customer ID
extended_input_schema.hint: Customer ID of the target Google Ads account, typically in the form of "1234567890". It must be the advertising account being managed by your manager account.

extended_input_schema.name: membershipStatus
extended_input_schema.label: Membership status
extended_input_schema.hint: Membership status of this user list. Indicates whether a user list is open or active.

toggle_field.name: membershipStatus
toggle_field.label: Membership status
toggle_field.hint:
Allowed values are: OPEN and CLOSED.
Click here for more details about the options.

extended_input_schema.name: closingReason
extended_input_schema.label: Closing reason
extended_input_schema.hint: Indicating the reason why this user list membership status is closed. It is only populated on lists that were automatically closed due to inactivity, and will be cleared once the list membership status becomes open.

toggle_field.name: closingReason
toggle_field.label: Closing reason
toggle_field.hint:
Allowed value: UNUSED.
Click here for more details about the options.

extended_input_schema.name: accountUserListStatus
extended_input_schema.label: Account user list status
extended_input_schema.hint: Indicates if this share is still enabled. When a UserList is shared with the user this field is set to ENABLED. Later the userList owner can decide to revoke the share and make it DISABLED. The default value of this field is set to ENABLED.

toggle_field.name: accountUserListStatus
toggle_field.label: Account user list status
toggle_field.hint:
Allowed values are: ENABLED and DISABLED.
Click here for more details about the options.

extended_input_schema.name: integrationCode
extended_input_schema.label: Integration code
extended_input_schema.hint: An ID from external system. It is used by user list sellers to correlate IDs on their systems.

extended_input_schema.name: membershipLifeSpan
extended_input_schema.label: Membership life span
extended_input_schema.hint: Number of days a user's cookie stays on your list since its most recent addition to the list. This field must be between 0 and 540 inclusive. However, for CRM based userlists, this field can be set to 10000 which means no expiration.

extended_input_schema.name: eligibleForSearch
extended_input_schema.label: Eligible for search
extended_input_schema.hint: Indicates if this user list is eligible for Google googleAds.search Network.

toggle_field.name: eligibleForSearch
toggle_field.label: Eligible for search
toggle_field.hint: Allowed values are: true and false.

extended_input_schema.name: crmBasedUserList
extended_input_schema.label: CRM based user list
extended_input_schema.hint: User list of CRM users provided by the advertiser.

properties.label: Upload key type
properties.hint: Matching key type of the list. Mixed data types are not allowed on the same list.

toggle_field.name: uploadKeyType
toggle_field.label: Upload key type
toggle_field.hint:
Allowed values are: CONTACT_INFO, CRM_ID and MOBILE_ADVERTISING_ID.
Click here for more details about the options.

properties.name: uploadKeyType

properties.label: Data source type
properties.hint: Data source of the list. Default value is First party. Only customers on the allow-list can create third-party sourced CRM lists.

toggle_field.name: dataSourceType
toggle_field.label: Data source type
toggle_field.hint:
Allowed values are: FIRST_PARTY, THIRD_PARTY_CREDIT_BUREAU and THIRD_PARTY_VOTER_FILE.
Click here for more details about the options.

properties.name: dataSourceType

properties.label: App ID
properties.hint: A string that uniquely identifies a mobile application from which the data was collected to the Google Ads API. For iOS, the ID string is the 9 digit string that appears at the end of an App Store URL (e.g., "476943146" for "Flood-It! 2" whose App Store link is http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/flood-it!-2/id476943146). For Android, the ID string is the application's package name (e.g., "com.labpixies.colordrips" for "Color Drips" given Google Play link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.labpixies.colordrips). Required when creating CrmBasedUserList for uploading mobile advertising IDs.
properties.name: appId

properties.label: Prepopulation status
properties.hint: The status of pre-population. The field is default to NONE if not set which means the previous users will not be considered.

toggle_field.name: prepopulationStatus
toggle_field.label: Prepopulation status
toggle_field.hint:
Allowed values are: REQUESTED, FINISHED and FAILED.
Click here for more details about the options.

properties.name: prepopulationStatus

properties.label: Rule type
properties.hint: Rule type is used to determine how to group rule items.

toggle_field.name: ruleType
toggle_field.label: Rule type
toggle_field.hint:
Allowed values are: AND_OF_ORS and OR_OF_ANDS.
Click here for more details about the options.

properties.name: ruleType
ruleItemGroups
properties.label: Rule item groups
properties.hint: List of rule item groups that defines this rule. Rule item groups are grouped together based on rule type.

properties.name: ruleItems
properties.label: Rule items
properties.hint: Rule items that will be grouped together based on rule type.

properties.label: Operator
properties.hint: Number comparison operator.

toggle_field.name: operator
toggle_field.label: Operator
toggle_field.hint:
Allowed values are: GREATER_THAN, GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL, EQUALS, NOT_EQUALS, LESS_THAN, LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL and OR_OF_ANDS.
Click here for more details about the options.

properties.name: operator

properties.label: Value
properties.hint: Number value to be compared with the variable.
properties.name: value

properties.label: Number rule item
properties.hint: An atomic rule item composed of a number operation.
properties.name: numberRuleItem

properties.label: Operator
properties.hint: String comparison operator.

toggle_field.name: operator
toggle_field.label: Operator
toggle_field.hint:
Allowed values are: CONTAINS, EQUALS, STARTS_WITH, ENDS_WITH, NOT_EQUALS, NOT_CONTAINS, NOT_STARTS_WITH and NOT_ENDS_WITH.
Click here for more details about the options.

properties.name: operator

properties.label: Value
properties.hint: The right hand side of the string rule item. For URLs or referrer URLs, the value can not contain illegal URL characters such as newlines, quotes, tabs, or parentheses.
properties.name: value

properties.label: String rule item
properties.hint: An atomic rule item composed of a string operation.
properties.name: stringRuleItem

properties.label: Operator
properties.hint: Date comparison operator.

toggle_field.name: operator
toggle_field.label: Operator
toggle_field.hint:
Allowed values are: EQUALS, NOT_EQUALS, BEFORE and AFTER.
Click here for more details about the options.

properties.name: operator

properties.label: Value
properties.hint: String representing date value to be compared with the rule variable. Times are reported in the customer's time zone.
properties.name: value

properties.label: Offset in days
properties.hint: The relative date value of the right hand side denoted by number of days offset from now. The value field will override this field when both are present.
properties.name: offsetInDays

properties.label: Date rule item
properties.hint: An atomic rule item composed of a date operation.
properties.name: dateRuleItem

properties.label: Left operand
properties.hint: Left operand of the combined rule. This field is required and must be populated when creating new combined rule based user list.

properties.label: Rule
properties.hint: Boolean rule that defines visitor of a page. Required for creating a date specific rule user list.
properties.name: rule

properties.label: Start date
properties.hint:
Start date of users visit. If set to 2000-01-01, then the list includes all users before end date.
Required for creating a data specific rule user list.
properties.name: startDate

properties.label: End date
properties.hint:
Last date of users visit. If set to 2037-12-30, then the list includes all users after start date.
Required for creating a data specific rule user list.
properties.name: endDate

properties.label: Date specific rule user list
properties.hint: Visitors of a page during specific dates. The visiting periods are defined as follows: Between start date (inclusive) and end date (inclusive); Before end date (exclusive) with start date = 2000-01-01; After start date (exclusive) with end date = 2037-12-30.
properties.name: dateSpecificRuleUserList

extended_input_schema.name: logicalUserList
extended_input_schema.label: Logical user list
extended_input_schema.hint: User list that is a custom combination of user lists and user interests.

properties.name: rules
properties.label: Rules
properties.hint: Logical list rules that define this user list.

properties.label: Operator
properties.hint: The logical operator of the rule.

toggle_field.hint:
Allowed values are: ALL, ANY and NONE.
Click here for more details about the options.

properties.name: operator
ruleOperands

properties.hint: The list of operands of the rule.

properties.label: User list

extended_input_schema.label: Basic user list
extended_input_schema.hint: User list targeting as a collection of conversion or remarketing actions.

properties.name: actions
properties.label: Actions
properties.hint: Actions associated with this user list.

properties.label: Conversion action
properties.hint: A conversion action that's not generated from remarketing.
properties.name: conversionAction

properties.label: Remarketing action
properties.hint: A remarketing action.
properties.name: remarketingAction

block.name: search_objects
block.description: Search for User lists in Google Ads

properties.label: Resource name
properties.hint:
The resource name of the user list.
User list resource names have the form: customers/{customer_id}/userLists/{user_list_id}
properties.name: resourceName

properties.label: Membership status
properties.hint: Membership status of this user list. Indicates whether a user list is open or active.

toggle_field.name: membershipStatus
toggle_field.label: Membership status
toggle_field.hint:
Allowed values are: OPEN and CLOSED.
Click here for more details about the options.

properties.name: membershipStatus

properties.label: Closing reason
properties.hint: Indicating the reason why this user list membership status is closed. It is only populated on lists that were automatically closed due to inactivity, and will be cleared once the list membership status becomes open.

toggle_field.name: closingReason
toggle_field.label: Closing reason
toggle_field.hint:
Allowed value: UNUSED.
Click here for more details about the options.

properties.name: closingReason

properties.label: Account user list status
properties.hint: Indicates if this share is still enabled. When a UserList is shared with the user this field is set to ENABLED. Later the userList owner can decide to revoke the share and make it DISABLED. The default value of this field is set to ENABLED.

toggle_field.name: accountUserListStatus
toggle_field.label: Account user list status
toggle_field.hint:
Allowed values are: ENABLED and DISABLED.

properties.hint: An ID from external system. It is used by user list sellers to correlate IDs on their systems.

properties.hint: String representing date value to be compared with the rule variable. Times are reported in the customer's time zone.
properties.name: value

properties.label: Offset in days
properties.hint: The relative date value of the right hand side denoted by number of days offset from now. The value field will override this field when both are present.
properties.name: offsetInDays

properties.label: Date rule item
properties.hint: An atomic rule item composed of a date operation.
properties.name: dateRuleItem

properties.label: Right operand
properties.hint: Right operand of the combined rule. This field is required and must be populated when creating new combined rule based user list.
properties.name: rightOperand

properties.label: Rule operator
properties.hint: Operator to connect the two operands.

toggle_field.name: ruleOperator
toggle_field.label: Rule operator
toggle_field.hint:
Allowed values are: AND and AND_NOT.
Click here for more details about the options.

properties.name: ruleOperator

properties.label: Combined rule user list
properties.hint: User lists defined by combining two rules.
properties.name: combinedRuleUserList

properties.label: Rule type
properties.hint: Rule type is used to determine how to group rule items.

toggle_field.name: ruleType
toggle_field.label: Rule type
toggle_field.hint:
Allowed values are: AND_OF_ORS and OR_OF_ANDS.
Click here for more details about the options.

properties.name: ruleType
ruleItemGroups
properties.label: Rule item groups
properties.hint: List of rule item groups that defines this rule. Rule item groups are grouped together based on rule type.

properties.name: ruleItems
properties.label: Rule items
properties.hint: Rule items that will be grouped together based on rule type.

properties.label: Operator
properties.hint: Number comparison operator.

toggle_field.name: operator
toggle_field.label: Operator
toggle_field.hint:
Allowed values are: GREATER_THAN, GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL, EQUALS, NOT_EQUALS, LESS_THAN, LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL and OR_OF_ANDS.
Click here for more details about the options.

toggle_field.hint:
Allowed values are: CONTAINS, EQUALS, STARTS_WITH, ENDS_WITH, NOT_EQUALS, NOT_CONTAINS, NOT_STARTS_WITH and NOT_ENDS_WITH.

properties.label: Value

properties.name: offsetInDays

properties.label: Date rule item

properties.name: dateRuleItem

properties.label: Rule
properties.hint: Boolean rule that defines visitor of a page. Required for creating a date specific rule user list.
properties.name: rule

properties.label: Start date
properties.hint:
Start date of users visit. If set to 2000-01-01, then the list includes all users before end date.
Required for creating a data specific rule user list.
properties.name: startDate

properties.label: End date
properties.hint:
Last date of users visit. If set to 2037-12-30, then the list includes all users after start date.
Required for creating a data specific rule user list.
properties.name: endDate

properties.label: Date specific rule user list
properties.hint: Visitors of a page during specific dates. The visiting periods are defined as follows: Between start date (inclusive) and end date (inclusive); Before end date (exclusive) with start date = 2000-01-01; After start date (exclusive) with end date = 2037-12-30.
properties.name: dateSpecificRuleUserList

properties.label: Rule
properties.hint: Boolean rule that defines this user list. The rule consists of a list of rule item groups and each rule item group consists of a list of rule items.
properties.name: rule

properties.label: Expression rule user list
properties.hint: Visitors of a page. The page visit is defined by one boolean rule expression.
properties.name: expressionRuleUserList
rules
properties.label: Rules
properties.hint: Logical list rules that define this user list.

properties.label: Operator
properties.hint: The logical operator of the rule.

toggle_field.hint:
Allowed values are: ALL, ANY and NONE.

properties.name: operator
ruleOperands

properties.hint: The list of operands of the rule.

properties.label: User list
properties.hint: Resource name of a user list as an operand.

properties.label: Logical user list
properties.hint: User list that is a custom combination of user lists and user interests.
properties.name: logicalUserList
actions
properties.label: Actions
properties.hint: Actions associated with this user list.

properties.label: Conversion action
properties.hint: A conversion action that's not generated from remarketing.
properties.name: conversionAction

properties.label: Remarketing action
properties.hint: A remarketing action.
properties.name: remarketingAction

properties.label: Basic user list
properties.hint: User list targeting as a collection of conversion or remarketing actions.
properties.name: basicUserList

extended_input_schema.name: client_customer_id
extended_input_schema.label: Client customer ID
extended_input_schema.hint: Customer ID of the target Google Ads account, typically in the form of "1234567890". It must be the advertising account being managed by your manager account.

extended_input_schema.name: fields
extended_input_schema.label: Fields
extended_input_schema.hint: The list of fields to include in the result. All fields will be returned by default.

toggle_field.name: fields
toggle_field.label: Field names
toggle_field.hint: Enter field names separated by comma. Click here for more details about the selectable fields (under SELECT clause).

extended_input_schema.name: filter
extended_input_schema.label: Query filter
extended_input_schema.hint:
Enter a query filter (WHERE clause) using Google Ads Query Language.
e.g. campaign.status = 'PAUSED' or segments.date DURING LAST_30_DAYS
Click here for more details about the filterable fields and supported operators (under WHERE clause).

properties.label: Sort field
properties.hint: Enter field name. Click here for more details about the sortable fields (under ORDER BY clause). e.g. campaign.id
properties.name: sort_field

properties.label: Sort order
properties.hint: The order to sort the results on.

toggle_field.name: sort_order
toggle_field.label: Sort order
toggle_field.hint: Allowed values are: DESC, ASC

properties.name: sort_order

extended_input_schema.name: page_token
extended_input_schema.label: Page token
extended_input_schema.hint: Token of the page to retrieve. If not specified, the first page of results will be returned. Use the value obtained from Next page token in the previous response in order to request the next page of results.

extended_input_schema.name: page_size
extended_input_schema.label: Page size
extended_input_schema.hint:
Maximum number of results to return in this page. Set this to a reasonable value to limit the number of results returned per page.
The default value is 100.
